values:
Ten How's

How did you get one of your scars?
scar on calf, from playing with fire and dropping the lit thing on my leg

How did you celebrate your last birthday?
With my family, Cassie and Kagun

How are you feeling at this moment?
Sick but I'm doing alright

How did your night go last night?
it was ok, I was stuck in an incredibly boring class but other than that it wasn't horrible

How did you do in high school?
It was great but I would never do it again

How did you get the shirt you're wearing?
I bought it from Target

How often do you see your best friend?
I used to see her everyday, than I saw her every other day or so, then I saw her every day, then I didn't talk or see her for 6 months, then i saw her 1-2 times a week, and now I see her in person every few months and online once a week.

How much money did you spend last month?
more than i should have

How old do you want to be when you get married?
25 or so

How old will you be at your next birthday?
22

Nine What's

Your mothers name?
Nancy

What did you do last weekend?
went to RR with Kagun

What is the most important part of your life?
my family

What would you rather be doing?
laying with kagun

What did you last cry over?
leaving RR

What always makes you feel better when you’re upset?
depends why I am upset

What’s the most important thing you look for in a significant other?
honesty

What are you worried about?
many things: graduating, finding a job, supporting kagun and i, taking care of things, and many other things

What did you have for breakfast?
I didn't.

Eight Have You's

Have you ever liked someone who had a girlfriend/boyfriend?
probably

Have you ever had your heartbroken?
Yes.

Have you ever been out of the country?
Yno but Italy is at the top of my list

Have you ever done something outrageously dumb?
sure I have

Have you ever been back stabbed by a friend?
somewhat

Have you ever had sex on the beach?
no but i don't really want to, i'd rather join the mile high club

Have you ever dated someone younger than you?
ionce or twice but i usually date older

Have you ever read an entire book in one day?
yep.


Seven Who's

Who was the last person you saw?
the guy proctoring my exam

Who was the last person you texted?
kagun

Who was the last person you hung out with?
kagun

Who was the last person to call you?
kagun

Who did you last hug?
kagun

Who was the last person you said "i love you" to?
kagun


Six Where'sFive Do's/Does'

Do you like someone right now?
very much so

Do you think anyone likes you?
he better

Do you ever wish you were someone else?
not usually, not anymore

Do you know the muffin man?
the muffin man?!

Does the future scare you?
all the time but just the immediate future, the distant future like marriage and family, not at all


Four Why's

Why are you best friends with your best friend(s)?
She is completely amazing. She is so strong and loyal and dedicated to everything she does that it is nothing short of inspirational. I love her more than life itself.

Why did you get a myspace?
because

Why did your parents give you the name you have?
i ask that all the time

Why are you doing this survey?
figured i had nothing better to do until kagun gets home and we get some soup for me

If you could have one super power what would it be?
Teleportation. so i can see my lovely cassie on her birthday

If you could go back in time and change one thing, would you?
not sure there is something I would change, everything that has happened both good and bad in my life i believe has served a purpose

If you were stranded on a deserted island and could bring one thing what would you bring?
other than a boat to get me off of the island? Cassie or Kagun, someone to talk to or eat...whichever i needed most ;)


Two Would-You-Evers

Would you ever get back together with any of your ex’s if they asked you?
NO. I'm sorry boys, I am perfectly happy with the guy I'm with.

Would you ever shave your head to save someone you love?
if it would honestly save them

One Last Question

Are you happy with your life right now?
yeah, i am.

you know what I don't get?! Why people bother to show up to class late. I mean not like a few minutes late but I mean class is 3 hours long and you walk in with an hour left, why bother coming? It really bugs me. I guess It's just because I'm the type who barely likes to come in late by a minute. However, its still stupid of you to walk in when you obviously haven't cared about the class during the last two hours. 

I am in no means the best student, in fact I tend to fake my way through everything I can. I make it seem as if I care as much as I can but sometimes I can only do so much...like right now, I'm sure the professor thinks I'm taking notes and paying attention but rather, we all know...I am not. It's because I'm smart, I type and look up at him while he talks so it looks as if I actually am coping every word he is saying. 

well lets just pray i get out early, i'm bored out of my mind.

I will graduate this year!!! August! A year early for my class :) and I'll have two degrees. YAY for DOUBLE MAJORS!
Psychology and Sociology, I'm awesome. Anywho. Just was thinking about it and was excited so I thought I would post.

I officially have 3 tattoos.

i will post pics when cassie gives them to me

since no one else is really saying it....at least currently

HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO ME!!!!!!!!!!!!

so this is just basically for me to keep up with everything but if you read it and care..cool

thursday 11- 10 days until birthday; final in psychology of personality; physical therapy;study with donald for italian
friday 12-italian exam and presentation
saturday 13-xmas decorations and graduation parties out the wazzoo
sunday 14-start cleaning my apartment
monday 15-Graci's birthday (2); finish cleaning my apartment
tuesday 16-start kagun's apartment;physical therapy; dinner with eliscia for her birthday (20)
wednesday 17-finish kagun's apartment
thursday 18-pack for week in RR; physical therapy; go to doctor if needed
friday 19-drive to round rock with kagun; pick up the lovely cassie?
saturday 20-trail of lights with cassie and kagun etc
SUNDAY 21st-MY 21st BIRTHDAY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
monday 22-graci gets teeth cleaned
tuesday 23-cassie's homecoming party
wednesday 24-church with family 

bunch of free time

monday 29- home to denton!!
tuesday 30-look at ordering books for spring and sign up for class if needed
wednesday 31-armed forces bowl with kagun's family :)

ok so i've been sick to my stomach since saturday morning and I also think I'm starting to get a sinus infection...yay for stress and tired sickness...you would think my body would get used to this considering it happens 2-3 a year and always around finals time. grr. stupid body.

anywho, so i have two tests today, one i've already taken and one i'm about to take. Which really I should be studying for, but you know me, I put off the important things all the time. Currently, I'm just trying not to throw up so yay me. 

After I take my test, I am getting food for the first time today which is odd for me because usually I eat breakfast but today there was no time. Then I have one last class to go to before I'm free for break..well not really a break when you have to write a 20 page paper, a ten page paper, a 6 page paper, and a 2 page paper, and a presentation in Italian. THen I have physical therapy for my wrists and hands and then i get to pack and get ready to head to RR dor the weekedn which completely sucks because theres only going to be one person there I want to see and I have to spend the whole time away from Kagun and I HATE THAT!!! But at least I'll get my stuff done, well hopefully. 

Anywho, that's about it. I just wanted to type some of this out so that maybe it would relieve some stress and make me not think about throwing up. 

Have a good thanksgiving!

So i only update when there are things on my mind now and I only really do it to let it out and to move on with life from that point. However there are some things in the updates I do for other people so that you all know what I've been up to or what I'll be up to.

I still read a lot of entries on here and observe the lives of people i don't really talk to and i make my comments few and far between, at least to them. Some people have changed far more than they ever should have and yet somehow manage to stay the same and that in its self may be why we dont talk anymore. Either way the people in my past are that, in my past, they are still oved for always being there once upon a time but they are not in my present or really my future. Harsh but true. 

Anyways.

Cassie and I are getting a good flow with keeping up with each other. Whether its text messages, a few mins online, or the far between phone call but what we really use is letters and I love that we can manage this relationship from so far away. I cannot wait until December 19th when I pick her up at the airport and we get to drive to RR the next day together. It's going to be awesome! I just can't wait to see her...I think that's why this semester is going even slightly well is the fact that there is an end goal...to see her. However I also think that the reason everything seems out of reach is because i don't have her here but its all a learning experience and I'm sure I'll get used to it. 

Other issues....I do have Carpal Tunnel...at 20! That's so odd to every one, including me, but its true. I'll know more soon because I have to go have an EMG done to be sure what all is happening, but I also start Physical Therapy twice a week this week which takes more time from my schooling but i need it so i'll have to do it. THis whole ordeal is really getting to me because it slows me down, it makes me dependent on others, and it keeps me from doing so many things. And I already have no motivation for anything. 

My dad is in China for business, which is kind of cool but weird all at one time. Makes it hard to talk to him. But I guess its only two weeks anyway.

Someone used my pumpkins to break my window in my bedroom of my apartment and other people's windows at my apartment. It sucks because now i have a hole in my window letting air in, ruining my electric bill and freezing my bedroom at night. Hopefully soon it'll be taken care of.

My Brother stil lhasn't found a job in RR/Austin. He is out of the Air Force, at least actively, he has one year of reserve until he's free but yeah. He's having a tough time with being a first time home owner and dealing with not finding a job yet. He's upset that he didn't take the path I'm on but he doesn't see how far he has actually come from where he was when he was my age. 

Kagun and I are doing well. Yesterday was actually the 2 year anniversary of our first kiss and pretty much marks the point that I stopped thinking about other guys :) I'm happy with him and one day in the future we will be getting married. I have a promise ring and I love him so much.

School is falling apart on me. I have nothing under control because I just dont care anymore. I haven't had a break in 3 years. and I'll be graduating in August with two BAs, one is Psychology, one in Sociology :) and then I'll be joining the workforce. I'll also be moving from Denton to Dallas to be closer to Kagun when he goes to Parker Chiropractic College. I'm excited for a new focus and new life.

Anywho, I was going to go more in depth on school but my wrists are getting sore so I must stop here.

Hope everyone is doing okay.

ok although this is probably going to mess with my wrists and make them hirt entirely too much I think I may need to address it, if anything just for my own sake. Because right now I'm either emotional due to my period or maybe it is just built up from everything this semester. It has been a very quick and exhausting few weeks and I really can't imagine what else is going to be thrown my way.

lets just start with I miss cassie! I miss here an insane amount. I find that I try to just put it in the back of my head but that it piles up and then something goes wrong and i cry because i miss her and not so much for what is actually going on at the time. I hate school without her here. I hate that there is not a chance of me running into her or getting to see her during the weekend when we can share about our hectic week. I love and hate that she is in Purchase New York. I love it because i know it is perfect for her and because she is following her dreams and taking advantage of all the amazing things she is capable of. BUt i hate that we have to be so far away from each other. Honestly it just sucks. I know we got an exstended time together than most friends do but we've been through so much more than most and we've been together longer than most. this year marks 9 years of our friendship and although we are both extremely strong on our own we genuinely enjoy each others' company and enjoy seeing and talking together. I know we can talk via emails, messangers, letters, and phone, but its just not the same and this week we have barely been able to coordinate our schedules and we havent been as busy as we will get so i'm scared and worried about not being able to keep in touch as often as i would like us to. I mean we don't have a lot to say when we talk and really we just tell each other what all we've done but i like talking to her for long period's of time and i like seeing her and this week its been maybe a text a day just saying hi and not really getting to talk. we were supposed to have a phone call but i got too busy and so did she and then our phones were dieing so it just couldn't happen. so i just am having a tough time adjusting to this i suppose or maybe my emotions are just heightened and thats where i'm displacing them and letting them go to because really its the only thing really wrong with things right now. 

but i hate that feeling of being on the verge of tears and i hate even more when you start crying and you don't want to be comeuse you're in a public place

I feel like half of me is missing.........probably because it is.....i'm not doing well....but i've been here before and I know it gets easier, it just takes time.


Psychology: Circular Model.....why do you have lungs...to breath.....how do you breathe...with my lungs...though curently i feel like a half circle

first day of school! first day of school!!!



yes, I am lame, thank you!

so i got my wisdom teeth out this morning at seven thirty. i was in and out of the dentist in forty five minutes. Kagun drove me back to my parents house and now i'm sitting on the couch with maggie in my lap. Graci is getting a haircut so no little puppy bouncing  on me. But yeah slight pain as my numbness wares off and i can't take pills until the bleeding stops and i can take out the gauze that are back in my mouth. 

so i just had nitrous and some local injections and thats it but I got lucky because i only had to have my upper two done and they were already fully in my mouth so it was a realy simple thing. so yeah, I'm just resting until I can eat something and spending the night at my parents house before i head home tomorrow morning to finish healing in my own apartment. 

other than that, there's not much else going on today. 

no pain, lots of pudding, and good recovery
Kim

so I'm on my brand new laptop that is completely pimped out thanks to Travis, my bro's friend who is like a second brother. Anywho, that's about it. Im in RR. I have to have my wisdom teeth out this week and then I will return home to Denton.

So I've been thinking of fun ways to revamp my lj and I think I may be onto something, but I'll keep you posted.

Anywho...so this was just because I wanted to say what i've been up to, what i'm watching on tv, what i'm listening to, and a cool new trick I learned.... 


What I'm Watching:
       The Mole 5: Great show, if you've never watched the Mole, you're missing out. Check it out on Monday nights on ABC at 9pm
         So You Think You Can Dance: Great and I mean, GREAT season. If you're not into dance you may not get it but if you do like dance then watch it because it has all different styles and they just introduced Bollywood into the mix and it was awesome!!!!!!!!! Fox Wednesdays at 7pm
       America's Best Dance Crew: Best hip-hop and break/pop and lock groups from around the nation...check it out on MTV Thursday Nights 9pm (I believe)

What I'm Listening To:
       PCD- When I grow Up
     Jesse McCartney-Leavin'
     Brianna Taylor-Summertime
     Jordin Sparks-No Air
     Katy Perry- I kissed a Girl

Trick:
(mainly for girls but guys if you like it...cool for you) When you want a specific eyeliner look and you want to use a powder for your eyeliner, dip your brush into saline solution (contact solution) and then into powder it turns out looking awesome and this way you can use any color you want.

so I think I have to get rid of my dog, which completely sucks. I really love her but I don't have time for her and the things she needs, not while I'm doing school at least.

this sucks.

kill me......please


if there are any who object to this, please state the following:
Name:
Why you object:

brief but to the point.....

my roommate=bith from hell=got electricity cut off recently
moving=friday=can't wait
kagun=love him=he's most likely the perfect thing in my life right now
cassie=miss her=hell froze over and her ex said he was sorry
Olivia Broadfiled=good song=don't cry=listen to it on myspace=great song i want to choreograph
my body=quite mad at it=i still have passion for dance=it won't let me though
cleaning=takes way too long
wedding shows=addictive=and fun
round rock=i only miss my family=not so much anything else
my brother=married=moves home from SA in October
my nephew=may be my fave. kid ever (thus far)
school=starts tomorrow=i'm taking 14 hours this summer=i graduate in a year!


that's all I'm saying. 

love

Dear Kathryn
I don't really know how to tell you this, but our romance is over. I think I realized it when i changed tenis shoes in your closet and I saw you sit on Donald Duck. I'm sure you're open enough to understand how awful i felt. I'm returning your ring to you, but I'll keep your left ear as a memory. You should also know that I was interviewed by the times about a new life as a clone.

Greetings to your freaky family, 
-Kim-

so I may be getting a new journal one of these days since no one really reads mine anyways and it'll probably just be for me but if you add it that's cool too. I'll be sure to update this one with the new name. I also may just edit my friends on here or something to those who update and read mine and that I read theirs. no hard feelings if you don't read mine and sorry if I don't read yours but we all know how it goes. 

Anywho. .. to the point well sort of....to the random thoughts in my head that I am caring enough to express.

I think my mom dislikes me strongly...i think she always has. I know my dad and brother love me :) so that's good, right?

I'm basically living with my boyfriend. I bring a suitcase and stay for like a week at a time :) This keeps me happy, but without him...I am homeless because my place sucks massive ass!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Listen to Kate Voegele on Myspace, or see her perform on ONE TREE HILL, she is awesome! her name is Mia on OTH but that's her actual name above^^^^^^^^^^^.

My brother's wedding is this weekend!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I am a bridesmaid. The dress which used to fit perfectly, if not a bit loose....is now quite snug...fits, but is difficult to zip. I gained a few of the pounds I lost back which is definately my downfall and things are being taken care of to fix this issue but the whole dress thing really upsets me....I want my bro's wedding perfect...those of you who know me well know how much this wedding means to me because of the first time he got married and how much that broke him and how big a step this is for him to plunge back in....luckily this time around, the girl is much better! Back to me feeling ugly, fat, and did i mention ugly. The dress is already a size that isn't me but is the size dress I needed in this style...yeah, definately in the other dress i tried on at the shop, I was much smaller than the dress i am wearing's size. Which I am actually smaller than both so I shouldn't let it get to me, but it's hard. Some of you understand where I'm coming from on this, and some of you don't. I'm not looking for sympathy on this issue or even any one to tell me I'm beautiful. I am learned that I am beautiful! I  know this now, that was a big step for me to take and I have learned not to take a step backwards but it still doesn't help me with the dress and the few pounds I put back on. I know I'll lose the weight again, but it won't be quick enough to look amazing in the dress by saturday. though everyone I show the dress to on me says that they love it and that i look great so maybe I should just focus on that and ignore the rest....besides the only place that doesn't look so great, in my opinion, is the upper back and my hair will be down and straight (my hair has gooten really long) and that will cover it so why should I even fret over this. Yes, I need to keep working out and eating better, but no I don't need to worry about one dress one time even if it is my brothers wedding because no matter what I am seeing....I know others are seeing something better. I'm glad I am working this all out while sitting here typing, but I am sorry to any of you who actually do read this and have read through all of this. You know me, I post rarely and don't care about cutting it :)

well that's the main thing in my head but I think I will talk about a few other random things before moving on.

school is not great. I mean so far my grades are fine, from what I know, but I have no motivation for going to class which as we almost all know....is BAD! But anywho, I'm just kind of burnt out, which happens when you're only on the second year and you are already a junior when you only came in with 6 credits...meaning I did most my work...54 hour of work here. But see my reasoning is I don't want to be here forever and this way I will graduate in 09 and star grad school, if i get in( don't even get me started on that worry) and I will be done with my masters in like 2.5 or less years. Then I can get a job and start a family (hopefully with Kagun, but we'll see). 

moving on.....

Kagun and I...we're good. even with me living here, we haevn't fought much this week and we've been careful about the whole living here thing because we don't want to step on each other's toes and we don't want to over do it. We are almost to 7 months of dating....I'm so excited. This is my longest relationship as most of you know and I just don't want it to go away. I love him so much. More than I have ever loved anyone....or at least in a different way. 

and again....

V-day.... I have no idea what to get him. I've only had one guy on v-day before and well it was James....if you remember, it also ended that day(call me heartless all you want, but he made me want to gag at that point as my boyfriend...I'm sorry). Seems I only update when I need to procrastinate about doing something else. Currently, I am avoiding unpacking and cleaning my room. The sad thing as some of you might have realized is that I have been home for exactly a week...and have yet to unpack. Well love, the reason is...I hate it here and spent my time at Kagun's. :)

However, I am in the process of preparing for school which starts monday and he is at his parent's house cleaning out his old room, thus I am here. Soon as I do at least a little something productive, other than my shower, I will go to the store for the rest of the items needed for dinner tonight. I had fun last night cooking for him and am planning on making dinner again tonight. What can I say, I like playing house. Though, I have to wait and see if he's even going to be home because he has one of my ingredients in his car. 

Moving on...Christmas and My birthday have passed. They were ok. Could have been a hell of a lot better. I had one phone call telling me my friend's mom had passed away (please take a moment for Mrs. Raju, Natasha's mom) .........and I had a call from Kimmy, telling me she was in the hospital ( and as of this morning she is still there) {side note: Seaton Northwest in Austin/Cedar Park area room 439}. So chritsmas and stuff was kind of a bummer.

Good note: Kagun came and visited me while I was stuck at home!!!!!!!!!!!! I love that boy! and even better he loves me. Our 6th month anniversary is this month; granted that's our official anniversary but really we've been together for over a year now..but that's just complicated to explain if you don't already know. 

(Rant Beginning)
Small Rant: Stupid bitch of a drunk slut roommate apparently welcomed herself into my room and shower while I was gone!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
(Rant over)

I am procrastinating a bit, but I am in much need of an update. 

going back...Halloween-was lame for me this year..I did nothing but study for an exam.

November was a blur...I had a ten page paper, and a whole bunch of other shit all do right after thanksgiving. 

Start of december, hasn't been bad. It's finals week and I only have four final...However, I have 3 tomorrow and 1 on wednesday, so if you thought your school life sucked, i've probably got you beat. Oh and the last exam I take tomorrow is the class that I am repeating for the second time and have to pass this time...lets all say a prayer for me. 

Kagun and I almost broke up on our four month...we stayed together and are working on things but that sucked ass....that's back tracking a bit but I thought I would mention it any way. 

Two of my best friends kind of upset me a bit but it just pointed out the truth anyway so i guess it doesn't matter. 

I'm looking forward to a break from school but not from Kagun...two weeks without seeing him will suck ass so keep me distracted while I'm home people. I'll be home the day before my birthday (if you don't know this date....you don't love me...so look it up) until the 3rd of January

Moving on...guess that's all I'm going to say for now. Back to studying.

So as most of you know, I went home this past weeked. I tag-temmed home with Kimmy to make the drive a bit more fun. I stopped when we got to Fort Worth so I could say goodbye to her and then continued on to Denton. Once home, I went to the dorm to see Talie and give her a present. Then I went to my apartment and made dinner, cleaned my room, emptied part of my car, and cassie came over for a bit before I had to come to Kagun's to work on my paper since my microsoft word would not open for some reason. I wrote my paper and typed my homework and then went back to my apartment and took a bubble bath before updating my women's studies blog, which is on another blog site. I went to bed and then Kagun came over around 4, because for some reason he wanted to be with me and I of course am always willing to let that happen. He drove me to class this morning, early, so that I could finish the homework since my book has not shown up yet and I have to keep going to the bookstore to copy problems, which really sucks by the way. Then I went to my classes. I got my italian test back and I made an 85, so that totally rocked my day. Then I got out of W.S early and came to Kagun's to take him to class and then return to rewrite that paper since she gave us an extra day to change things as we would like to. I just finished and some time to pass before I go to the optional conversation class for Italian at Art Six, local coffee shop :) I figured I might as well stay at his apartment because I have nothing better to do and I can use it as a break from homework for a little bit. 

I have a test tomorrow in Environmental Science which I also need to be studying for, but I figure I can do that tonight because I've been in class everyday but one since I was in the hospital and I think I know enough for a multiple choice test. 

Well I think I'll go relax, maybe do algebra homework, and watch tv :)

Ciao!

so it has been awhile since I updated and since I'm on a break from my government class I will update quickly about things. 

I have not been able to sleep or relax in almost a week which is really taking its effects on my body and my health. That's no bueno, that's for sure. Plus I just found out that I'm getting paid crapily because I'm not an RA...which is not what my job is so it is completely rediculous, but it's alright, I'm just going to basically screw over the system by not working as hard as I have been and by only doing the bare minimum. I don't really need the money, that's not why I took this job. I took is to live in Victory and I can do basically nothing and still live there, so that is what I intend to do. 

TOday is my first day off in a very long time and I have class until 4 but then I should be hanging out with Kagun and hopefully getting to relax and have some fun. I have bascially told everyone that if they call me to work they will get no answer because there is no way in HELL I am doing anything today but school and free time.

I need to make sure I tape SO YOU THINK YOU CAN DANCE though because I probably won't see it. Plus ONE TREE HILL is on, but they put those episodes on the website so I can watch that during my shift this weekend.

well, back to class I go.

But by the way...with my new, not going to do much attitude...I can come home more...at least once a month :) which I probably will since there are some important people having birthdays soon ;)

have  good day all.

Hearts, Stars, and Horseshoes.

Just an update about what's been going on.

Wednesday night I got in an accident, I'm alright and now I have my mom's car for a bit. Thursday I had lunch with Kimmy and Natasha before going by the school to see people and then over to Alex's house to see him and Kevin. I watched So You Think You Can Dance and I was very excited for the new seson. I got up early friday and met u with Carly and Kathryn at Graduation, where three of my four boys graduated :( So proud of them by the way :) Then drove back up here with the girls, saw Pirates. Which was even better than the first :)!!!! Met up with Kagun and came back to the dorm :) Saturday morning we woke up and got ready for Scarby, which kicked ass. Hung out there all day! (ps. Kagun is totally adorable) Then came home and met some of the staff with the camp, hung with Talie at the front desk, took a shower, and then went to bed. Now it's my first day of working the desk and I have to admit I'm a bit worried but I know it won't be bad. :/ The dorm is quiet right now because all the cheerleaders are at the gym but in a few hours this will be a scary place :) 

Well that's my update for now.

Hope everyone is having a good summer!
